attributes.action: Include more high quality basketball courts in Plymouth
attributes.additional_details: The government don’t pay enough attention to people in the uk who like basketball
attributes.background: Make the courts big with roofs and have nice floors with glass backboards good rims and nets 10 ft hoops aswell adjustable

rejection.details:
Responsibility for local amenities is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also contact your local council directly: https://www.plymouth.gov.uk/
